name: SaveHer!
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
In this game you save girlfriend, who was kidnapped by an energy monster. Fly on your ship and destroy its minions. To defeat the bosses, you must dance them to death! If you played the guitar or something like that, you will understand the essence.

★ Choose your strategy for controlling a warship
★ The experience gained in battle will not pass in vain: over time, you improve your skills
★ Different locations
★ After the game you will start hating your keyboard
★ Affordable, minimum price
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
